questions.question: I went to the same high school as Madonna.
I got my butt kicked by Jean Claude Van Damme.
I once danced for 30 hours straight without caffeine (or drugs).
I have a fish named Bully, and he follows & swims alongside my finger.
I was on the show Blue's Clues as a little kid.
My ancestors are from five continents.
I play the banjo.
I can make my tongue look like it's split down the middle.
I used to snore so loud that I had to get surgery to fix it
On my 18th birthday I was arrested for vandalizing a police car.
I have haunting dreams about penguins sometimes.
I nearly slept on the hotel floor of a now 3x Grammy winning artist back when I was a teen..
I was in a horse stampede and barely survived.
I have Synaesthesia, Hypergraphia, etc.
I don't know how to ride a bicycle.
I auditioned for X-Factor USA and they told me I sing too quietly.
I like to find stray kittens that have been abandoned by the cat mom, and raise it until I find them a new adoption family.
I make my own ice cream.
I once went through airport security with a bullet case in my boots.
My undergraduate major at university was Human Biology.
I worked as a movie trailer editor for several years at motion picture advertising studio.
I was part of a military style drill team for 8 years.
I peed the bed until I was 12.
I used to have a band named Sabbatical in college.
I won a blind chess tournament by only moving one piece.
I wanted to become a professional figure ice skater when i was a kid.
I was part of a sorority in undergrad.
I went to three different colleges in my undergrad.
I've written several different screenplays including two episodic ones and only three made it into production.
The last book I fully read was Mockingjay.
